title: [BUG] Blazor Wasm [DebugMode]: No canvas element was provided
body:
### Description When I test my blazor app in debug mode from the ide, the skia content could not work. It shows "No canvas element was provided" in the browser console. When I use dotnet watch command to run my app, it works all fine. Skiasharp 3.119 ### Code I just use this simple page to test. ```razor
@code { private void OnPaintSurface(SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs args) { // My own paint commands GraphPainter.DrawOnCanvas(args.Surface.Canvas); } } ``` ### Expected Behavior _No response_ ### Actual Behavior _No response_ ### Version of SkiaSharp 3.116.0 (Current) ### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp 3.116.0 (Current) ### IDE / Editor Other (Please indicate in the description) ### Platform / Operating System macOS ### Platform / Operating System Version _No response_ ### Devices _No response_ ### Relevant Screenshots _No response_ ### Relevant Log Output ```shell ``` ### Code of Conduct - [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
